headline.print_headline: The Americas; Mexico: Sugary-Drinks Tax Is Left Intact
headline.main: Mexico: Sugary-Drinks Tax Is Left Intact

snippet: Mexico’s congress blocked an attempt to roll back part of a tax on soft drinks Thursday, responding to an uproar from public health advocates.
abstract: Mexico's congress restores 10 percent soft drink tax, overcoming efforts by some lawmakers to cut it.
lead_paragraph: Mexico’s congress blocked an attempt to roll back part of a tax on soft drinks Thursday, responding to an uproar from public health advocates.
